======================
Requirements and Setup
======================

CAZ write something here?


Requirements
============

CAZ give more details on these
- nPYc
- pyChemometrics
- intensityData and featureMetadata files


Setup
=====

********************
1. Import runISTOCSY
********************

**************************************
2. Define the paths to your data files
**************************************

**************************************************************
3. Define the path to a directory in which to save any outputs
**************************************************************


********
4. Run!!
********
